jobDescription: Background: Data Analysis is the art of collecting and analyzing data so that FEP can use said data to address gaps in operational capabilities and support analytics and reporting projects. The Senior Data Analyst/Modeler is a highly trained professional who will become an expert in our source data and lead the data mapping effort to migrate the data into our new enterprise data platform. The Senior Data Analyst/Modeler will use his/her technical expertise and work closely with source system experts to perform data research, run advanced queries, assess data quality and integrity issues, determine data definitions, and define data mappings. Tasks: Candidate will support the implementation of a Data Integration/Data Warehouse for the Informatics Teams Data Cleaning – identify erroneous data and determine appropriate resolutionAnalyze and assess the quality and integrity of the dataDevelop and implement data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and data qualityUnderstand the meaning/business context of dataAcquire data from internal or external data sources and maintain mapping documents of the files, databases/data systems.Perform data analysis and data modeling to create source to target mappings.Evaluate risk from statistical information to determine risk to operations or non-compliance.Perform gap analysis of data requirements versus current data sources.Work closely with business analysts and source data experts to develop data requirements.Assess current data and assist in the resolution of data anomalies.Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports and feedback Required Qualifications 5+ years demonstrated experience as Data AnalystStrong Structured Query Language (SQL) skillsDemonstrated ability to perform complex queries, assess data quality and develop data mappings.Working knowledge of U.S. Healthcare IndustryExperience with multiple data warehousing and analytics development projectsB.S. in Mathematics, Engineering, or Computer Science Preferred Qualifications Master of Science in Mathematics, Engineering, or Computer ScienceWorking knowledge of HEDIS, Fraud, Waste & AbuseWorking knowledge of ETLExperience with Hadoop and Big Data technologiesWorking knowledge of ALMWorking knowledge of COBOL
